title: COAST ORB / redchairconvo
description: The Red Chair Dialogue with Inland Empire.

dialogueTree.title: Inland Empire: "It's only a red chair. Just a red c..."
dialogueTree.text: It's only a red chair. Just a red chair in an empty shack -- with what looked like a dusty bow tie on the shelf. Nothing to see here, right?

links.title: You: ""Hey Kim, where are we?""
links.text: "Hey Kim, where are we?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""In someone's abandoned shack. On t..."
links.text: "In someone's abandoned shack. On the coast. In Martinaise..." He looks at you. "In Revachol."

links.title: Rhetoric: "He's afraid you've forgotten sudden..."
links.text: He's afraid you've forgotten suddenly.

links.title: You: ""What's with the red chair?""
links.text: "What's with the red chair?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Nothing. It's just a piece of furn..."
links.text: "Nothing. It's just a piece of furniture." He looks at the chair gathering dust.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Red paint is peeling off it. Looks..."
links.text: Red paint is peeling off it. Looks like blood, no?

links.title: You: ""What's with the red bow tie?" (Sho..."
links.text: "What's with the red bow tie?" (Show it to him.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's just a piece of clothing you'..."
links.text: "It's just a piece of clothing you've picked up. You do that, officer -- you collect clothes sometimes."

links.title: Empathy: "He sounds a little worried. It's an..."
links.text: He sounds a little worried. It's an odd habit.

links.title: Composure: "Don't be worried, lieutenant. Cloth..."
links.text: Don't be worried, lieutenant. Clothes are therapeutic.

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "You better not fucking think about..."
links.text: You better not fucking think about ditching me for some shitty cum stained bow tie. You and I are gearing up for the *final showdown* that's gonna be off *all walls*. You wait and see.

links.title: Half Light: "Your neck tie sounds very scared. N..."
links.text: Your neck tie sounds very scared. NEVER take it off.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Yes. Agreed. You should never take..."
links.text: Yes. Agreed. You should never take your neck tie off. Ever.

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "You took *me* off for that shit? YO..."
links.text: You took *me* off for that shit? YOU FUCKING IDIOT! Put the horrific neck tie back on immediately -- or you will miss out on the FINAL SHOWDOWN. This is your last warning. Put me back on.

links.title: Half Light: "Your neck tie sounds very scared. I..."
links.text: Your neck tie sounds very scared. It's unsafe not to wear it. Put it back.

links.title: You: ""Could our suspect be staying here?""
links.text: "Could our suspect be staying here?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Here?" He looks around. "I don't s..."
links.text: "Here?" He looks around. "I don't see signs of recent habitation. This place is abandoned."

links.title: Suggestion: "See? He doesn't like the *vibration..."
links.text: See? He doesn't like the *vibration* from the red chair either.

links.title: You: ""All right. Let's move." [Finish th..."
links.text: "All right. Let's move." [Finish thought.]

links.title: You: "Sounds like we need to investigate..."
links.text: Sounds like we need to investigate it, then.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Investigate the blood red chair? Yo..."
links.text: Investigate the blood red chair? You're going to leave it alone, Harry. That's what you're going to do.

links.title: Half Light: "You suddenly feel afraid of the cha..."
links.text: You suddenly feel afraid of the chair. It looks like blood is peeling off it...

links.title: You: "[Discard thought.]"
links.text: [Discard thought.]
